Name: Battle Adjustment
Desc: Frame DMG Amplification. Gains and refreshes the Shield every 30s. (The lower the frame's Battle Power, the higher the DMG Amplification/Shield.)

Name: Shieldbearer
Desc: Hunter deals more damage/gains Resistance, has more ATK Rate and restores 3% max HP per second

Name: Trap Master
Desc: Preparation Phase Tactical Resource +1

Name: Defense
Desc: Gun after modification with significant improvement in Armor

Name: Overclock
Desc: Salamander after modification with significant improvement in firing performance but poor mobility

Name: Assistance
Desc: Pointy after modification with balanced performance

Name: Scorch Device
Desc: Ignites enemies within range for 2/3/5s (upgrade during the preparation phase), dealing 400% Fire DMG per second.

Name: Scorch Device
Desc: Constructs within range deals 30% more damage and gains 30% Resistance

Name: Scorch Device
Desc: Allies within range deal 20% more damage, gain 20% Resistance, and move 20% faster for 5s

Name: Supply Device
Desc: Allies within range restore 150/200/250 HP per second (upgrade during the preparation phase)

Name: Supply Device
Desc: Units that receive healing restore 25% more HP for every 20% HP lost

Name: Supply Device
Desc: Converts 3000% of the excess healing to Physical DMG

Name: Dark Device
Desc: Deals 900% Dark DMG to 1 enemy within range every 4/3/2s (upgrade during the preparation phase)

Name: Dark Device
Desc: For every identical device within double the range of the device, the device deals 12 more damage. And for every different device within that range, the character deals 12% more damage.

Name: Dark Device
Desc: Dark Device gains target +1 for every 2 allies within range (up to +3)

Name: Bolt Device
Desc: Casts lightning at a random spot within range every 2/1.5/1s (upgrade during the preparation phase), dealing 1200% Lightning DMG to enemies within 2m.

Name: Bolt Device
Desc: Upon receiving Lightning DMG, enemies have -5% All Resistances for 3.5s. (Can be stacked.)

Name: Bolt Device
Desc: Enemies within range take 10% more damage. Units closer to the center receive more damage. The device also casts one extra lightning.

Name: Frost Device
Desc: Slows down the enemies within range by 30/40/50% (upgrade during the preparation phase)

Name: Frost Device
Desc: Enemies within range receives Ice DMG equal to 10% max HP every 2s

Name: Frost Device
Desc: Upon dealing damage, the device has a 10% chance to freeze the enemy for 2s

Name: Amplification Core
Desc: Hunter DMG +25%

Name: Amplification Core
Desc: Hunter DMG +35%

Name: Amplification Core
Desc: Hunter DMG +50%

Name: Energy Core
Desc: Hunter HP +25%

Name: Energy Core
Desc: Hunter HP +35%

Name: Energy Core
Desc: Hunter HP +50%

Name: Amplification Field
Desc: Allies within 6m around the hunter gain +5% DMG

Name: Amplification Field
Desc: Allies within 6m around the hunter gain +8% DMG

Name: Amplification Field
Desc: Allies within 6m around the hunter gain +12% DMG

Name: Protection Field
Desc: Allies within 6m around the hunter gain +5% Resistance

Name: Protection Field
Desc: Allies within 6m around the hunter gain +8% Resistance

Name: Protection Field
Desc: Allies within 6m around the hunter gain +12% Resistance

Name: Maintenance Device
Desc: After dealing damage, hunter restores slight HP based on the damage

Name: Maintenance Device
Desc: After dealing damage, hunter restores medium HP based on the damage

Name: Maintenance Device
Desc: After dealing damage, hunter restores massive HP based on the damage

Name: Molten Core
Desc: Hunter's attacks have a 25% chance to ignite the enemy for 2s, dealing Fire DMG equal to 6% of the enemy's max HP

Name: Molten Core
Desc: Hunter's attacks have a 35% chance to ignite the enemy for 3s, dealing Fire DMG equal to 6% of the enemy's max HP

Name: Molten Core
Desc: Hunter's attacks have a 50% chance to ignite the enemy for 4s, dealing Fire DMG equal to 6% of the enemy's max HP

Name: Freezing Core
Desc: Hunter's attacks have a 10% chance to freeze the enemy 1s

Name: Freezing Core
Desc: Hunter's attacks have a 15% chance to freeze the enemy 1.5s

Name: Freezing Core
Desc: Hunter's attacks have a 20% chance to freeze the enemy 2s
